thread.title: Adele Wears a New Color on the Grammys Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Adele Wears a New Color on the Grammys Red Carpet

title: Adele Wears a New Color on the Grammys Red Carpet
text: By Nikki Ogunnaike Feb 12, 2017 Industry favorite and writer of amazing breakup songs, Adele, arrived at the Grammys in a look unlike one she's ever worn before. Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The five-time nominee wore an army green Givenchy dress, skipping the black Burberry gowns she's been known to wear. Checkered detailing criss-crossed the bust and the pleated skirt was embellished with lace panels. The actresses the finished the look with gold jewelry and a sweeping updo. More from ELLE:
